body.name: HOUSUIT White Dresser, 4 Drawer Dressers Chest of Drawers, Modern Tall Dresser, Wood Drawer Chest Storage Cabinet for Living Room, Hallway, Entryway, Home Office, Ivory White
features: Ample Storage Space - Maximize storage when you bring home this unique chest of drawers. 4 wide drawers can organize anything from cosmetics, ornament decoration, and file to books and toys, this wood dresser will meet all your storage needs

Multipurpose Usage - This dresser chest need not be limited to the living room. You can put it in your entryway underneath a mirror, or use it in your dining room or kitchen to showcase your decorative taste. It makes a versatile addition to any loft apartment
Modern Style - The 4 drawer dresser is a contemporary take on a simple look, brushed brass-finished knobs added to the chic design for a fashionable cabinet, it’s stunning!

Premium Material - Constructed of high-grade MDF, premium metal slides that can be pushed and pulled smoothly, the ivory white dresser meets your pursuit of quality. The surface is coated with environmentally friendly paint, which is waterproof and easy to clean. And the dresser fits for people aged 12+
Easy to assemble & Service - The package includes clear instructions and marked parts that you can quickly install this dresser with 4 drawers. And please contact us if you have any questions
body.description: HOUSUIT Drawer Chest with 4 Drawers This 4 dresser is made from MDF with an white finish, sturdy frame, smooth drawer sliding rails, and added classic alloy handles for a modern and fresh feel. Ideal for the living room and anywhere you want to place it. So it offers the flexibility to create your self-assembly home furniture. Made of high quality MDF board, waterproof and scratch-resistant.Equipped with anti-toppling device to keep it securely in place.Suitable for living room, entrance, hallway, etc.Large drawer size is 24.6”L x 13.8”W x 5.5”H.Simple structure makes it easy to assemble.

Large drawers are enough to store variety of daily necessaries. The drawers are easy glide, ensuring smooth everyday use. Satble Base The curve bottom base is beautful and durable, whole cabinet's can hold up to 280lbs. Classic Handle Bronze color handles add the finishing touch. It's bang on trend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For the price it’s a nice dresser. It took my husband about 3.5 hours to assemble. No pieces were missing and it seems sturdy. Drawers are good. Good buy for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buying a 3rd. Worth the $
reviews.reviewText: I bought one initially for our upcoming baby, and was so impressed I got a 2nd for my son whose dresser is falling apart. That one came with a chipped top, but aside from that is still stable and beautiful. I sent a message to the seller to see if I could get a replacement top for the at one. But I plan on buying a 3rd because they’re the perfect size for my kids, and I’d love them all the match - now my daughter is the only one who doesn’t!Seriously want a larger one for myself. Im really impressed with the quality and stability of the product. Directions were easy to follow. Put the 1st one together my myself at 9 months pregnant, with just a screwdriver, and in about 1.5 hours. With the second one I used my husband’s impact drill and it took me about 45 min.Totally worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I gave it 4 stars only becuase I had a hard time making the dresser feel sturdy as I was building it. I had to go back and tighten things a lot. Now that it’s put together, I love it and it’s sturdy. Perfect for our little ones clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars nice light duty dresser
reviews.reviewText: Arrived quickly. Very well wrapped. Very easy to assemble. Instructions have no text just images. Even still the images are excellent and all the parts are labeled. This is a very nicely put together dresser for light duty: light weight clothing and other items. I haven't used it yet and I could be mistaken. Drawer action slides easily open and closed. There are supports under all 4 drawers and at the bottom. There are some wood dowels but no wood glue included-just fyi. Color described as white but I feel it is softer and more like linen or light cream. The drawer pulls are small scaled but work well. No complaints for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve built many an Amazon/ikea furniture over the years and this piece had the most clear and simple instructions I’ve ever encountered. 10/10 on ease to buildIt is not real wood, so the dresser is very light and easy to move once built. I secured it to the wall for this reason, as it seems a gust of wind could blow it over lolIt is a beautiful piece and I’m using it as a nightstand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this dresser since August of 2023 and it’s never given me any problems. The drawers have an average amount of room. I’m happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars On the Smaller Side
reviews.reviewText: The dresser is a small transitional piece for my toddler until we buy her a bigger bedroom set. The assembly was easy, but took a long time to complete. Color matched exactly was was shown in the description. However dresser is very lightweight and material is not very sturdy. If not attached to the wall for my toddler, the dresser would easily tip when she tries to open the correct drawer. Also, the drawer bottoms are not very thick so I would not recommend putting a large amount of clothes/heavy items in them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love how light the drawers are when it closes. Great buy!
